Module gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core
Package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup

Class XmlMarkupParser

java.lang.Object
gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.XmlMarkupParser
public final class XmlMarkupParser extends Object
Provides utility functions to support reading and writing XML, and for producing error and warning messages.
